name: DesktopVRIK
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

Optional BTKUILib integration.
changelog:
- Fixed feet targeting previous movement parent position for a frame.
- Fixed issue with incorrect initialHeadHeight value causing avatar to always have footsteps disabled.
